titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison--BUTLER, a griff, about 21 years old, 5 feet 6 inches high; says he belongs to McBean, Willard & CoNICHOLAS, a griff, about 45 years old, 5 feet 8 1/2 inches high; says he belongs to the estate of Abna RobinsonAMOS, a griff, about 35 years old, 5 feet 5 inches high; says he belongs to MrLambarBETSY, a dark griffe, about 21 years old, 5 feet 3 inches high; says she belongs to Judge BermudezJOHN, a dark griff, about 37 years old, 5 feet 9 1/2 inches high; says he belongs to MrBishopThe owners will please comply with the law and take them awayJWORRELL, WardenNewOrleans, July 9, 1851jy9 1aw3w
mods.note: McBean, Willard & Co.; estate of Abna Robinson; MrLambar; Judge Bermudez; MrBishop
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
